nio/Filter.description: The Filter block will compare an incoming signal to a condition, evaluated as python code. If the condition is met, the signal will emit from the *True* terminal. If the condition is not met, the signal will emit from the *False* terminal.

conditions.title: Filter Conditions
conditions.description: A list of strings to be evaluated as filter conditions.

operator.title: Condition Operator
operator.description: Determines whether *all* or *any* of the conditions must be satisfied for the comparison.

false.description: Signals that evaluate to *False* will emit from this output.

true.description: Signals that evaluate to *True* will emit from this output.
